item.description:
Friday, Feb 6th


*Arrive at the Bretts.
*Chill out by the fireplace and the bar

Saturday, Feb 7th
Ski at

* Attitash (5 minutes Drive)
* Wildcat (20 minutes drive)
* Bretton Woods (20 minutes drive)
* Sunday River (1 hour drive )
* or Cross Country Ski at Bartlett, NH (5 min drive)

Saturday Apres ski event from 4-7pm (optional - A Brettl guest pass and Invite ($12) required for entry.)

Saturday Dinner: 7-8pm. Louisana Cajun Style Crawfish Boil Dinner (Optional - $20pp)

Saturday 9PM - 1AM - We will be hosting Carnival Theme Apres Ski Event with DJ Chris. A Brettl guest pass and Invite ($12) required for entry. Not optional if staying at the Bretts.

Sunday, Feb 8th
AM - Another Great Day for skiing
PM- Head for home.


Dinner Menu::
Boiled Crawfish
Gumbo
Jambalaya
Dessert

There are vegetarian versions of the Gumbo and Jambalaya.

Vegetarian with Crawfish is $20pp
Vegetarian without Crawfish is $15pp

Please note in your rsvp comments if you will be joining us for dinner.

Guest Fees for staying at the club are $20 per person per night.
Members and guests must be 21+
Directions will be made available to yes RSVPs...



Thanks,
Min
item.how_to_find_us: Direction will be sent to those who RSVP
item.name: Weekend at the Bretts February 6-8
